other_title: あずまんが大王 THE ANIMATION (Japanese)
plot: Azumanga Daioh is about high school life through the eyes of six girls with unusual personalities: Chiyo (the 10-year-old genius), Osaka (the resident airhead), Sakaki (the shy one prone to cat bites), Tomo (the loose cannon), Yomi (the short-tempered one) and Kagura (the resident jock).
opening_theme: "Soramimi Cake" (空耳ケーキ; Cake of Mishearing) by Oranges & Lemons
